fi.antiik.d3ciph3r.logic

Class DES

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.antiik.d3ciph3r.logic.DES

  • public class DES
extends Object
    Data Encryption Standard (DES) is a symmetric-key algorithm for the encryption of electronic data. Developed originally in the early 1970 at IBM. DES is a block cipher, takes a plaintext bits and transform it to another ciphertext of the same length. block size is 64 bits. Help and inspiration when the problems were too severe from: https://n3vrax.wordpress.com/2011/07/23/des-algorithm-java-implementation/
    Author:
    janantik
